title: Multi-mills aggregation of the built-up areas of existing structures where an integrated scheme for demolition and reconstruction of the existing structures of more than one mill, whether under common ownership or otherwise, is duly submitted, provided that FSI is in balance in the receiving mill land
clause_text: Multi-mills aggregation of the built-up areas of existing structures where an integrated scheme for demolition and reconstruction of the existing structures of more than one mill, whether under common ownership or otherwise, is duly submitted, provided that FSI is in balance in the receiving mill land.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Multi-mills aggregation of the built-up areas of existing structures where an integrated scheme for demolition and reconstruction of the existing structures of more than one mill, whether under common
